data.message: Can you change the iOS app back to the way it was, with the Messages button on the bottom? I use it almost daily, but I never use Marketplace. It's a pain to have to go all the way back to my news feed to access the Messages button in its new location.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Joseph. We truly appreciate all feedback from the Facebook community, and we use it to help inform our decisions. Let us know what would make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2dQfdVv. -Joe

Thanks for your feedback, Joseph. We truly appreciate all feedback from the Facebook community, and we use it to help inform our decisions. Let us know what would make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2e51LrP. -Joe
Marketplace sucks.  Feels like a creepy place where you will get ripped off. Facebook version of Craigslist.
